be8f81a97d079e6e4c45f805d88969f9bcae9d8a Email template sent to customers for MeetingMatrix sunset projects to inform them their migration date has been scheduled. templatePLCM_MMTechTransferEmail1 false

Hello {!$Record.ContactNameForEmails__c},


Congratulations on your decision to transfer to Delphi Diagramming Property Edition (formerly known as Amadeus Hospitality Diagramming Venue Edition). You are going to love this more modern and secure system that is designed by hospitality professionals who understand your needs. 

 

Property Administrator

You, {!$Record.ContactNameForEmails__c}, have been identified as your property’s administrator for Delphi Diagramming. If this is incorrect, it’s very important that you reply with the name and email address of the appropriate property administrator at your first opportunity.


Migration Date 

We are so excited to let you know that your migration is scheduled for {!$Record.AH_PLCM_Migration_Date__c}. This is the date we will take all the diagrams, setups, and system configurations we did for you in MeetingMatrix and transfer them to Delphi Diagramming. When we’re done, you will receive your login. As the administrator, you will have some tasks to do when the migration is complete, so block a couple of hours on your calendar for the following day.


Next Steps

Make sure you and your team are ready! Review and share the links below with appropriate team members as you prepare for the migration date above. 


The MeetingMatrix Technology Migration Promotion Definition of Services document outlines exactly what is and is not included in the migration process. This document should be carefully reviewed by your Property Administrator and Head of Catering, so you understand exactly what to expect when you first log in. The complimentary transfer is designed to be zero effort for you beforehand, with a bit of review and self-service tweaking after you get into the new system. 

 

  • Visit the following topics in our online Training & Help to prepare for this exciting transition.  Migration Frequently Asked Questions
  • Property Administrator tasks following migration
  • Glossary of Terms between MeetingMatrix and Delphi Diagramming

As explained in the FAQ topic, when the migration is complete, we will send a login to you, the Property Administrator. You will then complete the property administrator task list linked above to ensure your property configuration matches what you have in MeetingMatrix (estimate about 5 minutes per function room). When that’s done, you will create the logins for the remaining users, and you’ll be ready to have fun exploring the cool new bells and whistles in Delphi Diagramming.


While the basics of creating a diagram are very similar between the systems, it might take a few tries before everyone is as fast as they were in MeetingMatrix. Suggest that the team reserve some time on their calendar in the days following your migration to get logged in, review the training materials, and start creating all new diagrams there.


You’ll want to set a date no more than a couple of weeks after they receive their logins to fully transition over and remove MeetingMatrix from their workstations. They should still have access to a shared drive where they can find the .mms files if they want to import those, but you need to plan for a specific date when they no longer use MeetingMatrix.


Thank you so much, we appreciate your choice to partner with Amadeus as we shape the future of travel together.  



Migration Team 

Platform Life Cycle Management 

Amadeus Hospitality

www.amadeus-hospitality.com

Email Ref Id: {!$Record.Email_Ref_Id__c}

Email template sent to customers for MeetingMatrix sunset projects to remind them their migration date is tomorrow templatePLCM_MMTechTransferEmail2 false

Hello {!$Record.ContactNameForEmails__c},


Time to get excited! We will be migrating your MeetingMatrix data to Delphi Diagramming on {!$Record.AH_PLCM_Migration_Date__c}.


Next steps

  1. Because you have been identified as the property administrator, you will receive a login as soon as the migration is completed. This is the only login we will create for your property, so please reply immediately with the appropriate administrator's name and email address if it is not you.
  2. As stated in the MeetingMatrix Technology Migration Promotion Definition of Services document, you need to review the migrated data within two business days and alert us if you find any issues. The best way to review the migrated data is by completing this checklist: Property Administrator tasks following the migration. Plan for approximately 5 minutes per function room. If you’re at a large property, create users for other administrators to help you with the list.
  3. When the checklist is complete, create the users for the rest of the team (plan for 2 minutes per user). Note: the registration email expires after 7 days, so if someone is on vacation, create them later.
  4. Give the team a deadline for getting comfortable with the new system and removing MeetingMatrix (MM) from their workstations. Encourage them to create all new diagrams in DD instead of MM. They can even import their existing MM plans into DD! Provide access to a shared drive where their MM setup (.mms) files are saved so they can import them, but make a full transition over to the new system within a couple of weeks to ensure adoption and consistency.

You’ll hear from us next when your migration is complete.


Thank you,


Migration Team 

Platform Life Cycle Management 

Amadeus Hospitality

www.amadeus-hospitality.com

Email Ref Id: {!$Record.Email_Ref_Id__c}

Email template sent to customers for MeetingMatrix sunset projects to inform them their migration has been completed. templatePLCM_MMTechTransferEmail3 false


Hello {!$Record.ContactNameForEmails__c},


Congratulations, your migration from MeetingMatrix is complete and you’re ready to get started in Delphi Diagramming. Here’s what you need to do next:


Verify your account

  1. Check your Inbox for an email from "support@diagramming.mail.amadeus.com".
  2. The Subject line will be “Welcome to Amadeus Hospitality Diagramming!” (we’re still completing the name change over to Delphi Diagramming). Click ‘Get Started’ and follow the on-screen instructions to set up your account. The link expires in seven days, so make sure you log in as soon as possible.

Didn’t get the email? First, check your Spam or Clutter folders. If you still can’t find it, contact Support and we’ll resend it. Please mention that you have just completed a migration from MeetingMatrix.


Log in

  1. Navigate to the Login page https://venue.amadeus-hospitality.com/
  2. Save that in your Favorites
  3. Enter your Username, Password, and click “Log In”

Make it your own 

  1. Complete this checklist: Property administrator tasks following the migration. Plan for approximately 5 minutes per function room. If you’re at a large property, create users for other administrators to help you with the list. If you believe there is an issue with your migrated data, reply to this email within two business days.
  2. When you have completed all the tasks for resources, meeting space, seating preferences, and layout editor, create the users for the rest of the team (plan for 2 minutes per user). Note: the registration email expires after 7 days, so if someone is on vacation, create them later. When you create the users, send this link to help them get started: New User Guide for MeetingMatrix Migrations.
  3. Give the team a deadline for getting comfortable with the new system and removing MeetingMatrix (MM) from their workstations. Encourage them to create all new diagrams in DD instead of MM. They can even import their existing MM plans into DD! Provide access to a shared drive where their MM setup (.mms) files are saved so they can import them, but make a full transition over to the new system within a couple of weeks to ensure adoption and consistency. When everyone is using DD, you can batch print all the diagrams for the upcoming BEO packet in a matter of minutes! Just one of the many new features you’re going to love!

Need more help?

We’ve got you covered. Let the Training & Help guide you as you go, and for any technical questions, contact Amadeus Support. 


Need even more help?

We also have a range of professional services capable of guiding, configuring, and enhancing your new Delphi Diagramming experience. Contact Amadeus Sales to find out about add-on services like instructor-led training, adding new meeting space, and integration with Delphi.


We’re so excited to have you in the Delphi Diagramming community! Enjoy, and thank you again for being our valued partner!


Thank you, 


Migration Team 

Platform Life Cycle Management 

Amadeus Hospitality

www.amadeus-hospitality.com

Email Ref Id: {!$Record.Email_Ref_Id__c}

Email template sent to customers for MeetingMatrix sunset projects to check in one week after their migration. templatePLCM_MMTechTransferEmail4 false

Hello {!$Record.ContactNameForEmails__c},


We hope your first week using Delphi Diagramming is going well and want to make sure you’ve made progress on your full transition.

If not, please set aside an hour or two and knock it out. Don’t forget, you can create another user as an administrator to help (that only takes a couple of minutes). Take advantage of your new subscription and get the team in so they can have fun discovering all the new things they can do.


As a reminder, here’s the plan:

  1. Complete this checklist: Property administrator tasks following the migration.
  2. Create the users for the rest of the team and send this link: New User Guide for MeetingMatrix Migrations.
  3. Give the team a deadline for getting comfortable with the new system and removing MeetingMatrix from their workstations. The next time you’re running a BEO packet is a good target date. Have all diagrams for that packet imported from MM or created in Delphi Diagramming and discover the joy of batch printing.

Need help?

  1. Click the Help link in any screen for information about that page.
  2. If you can’t find the answer in Help or you have any technical issues, contact Amadeus Support. 
  3. If you want to purchase an integration with Delphi, time with a trainer, have our team create new meeting space, or you just can’t find the time to complete the above tasks and want us to coach you, contact Amadeus Sales for a quote.
  4.  

New releases and product feedback

We upgrade the product and release new features every few months, which you will immediately receive. You’ll be notified by a little pop up when you log in that an update has happened – make sure you always read about what’s new so you get the most out of your subscription. We decide what goes in the upgrades based on your feedback, so if you have suggestions for product improvements, please email those to Support. You can easily find their contact information in Help.


Thank you ever so much for choosing Delphi Diagramming. We look forward to partnering with you to make your daily diagramming tasks enjoyable! 


Migration Team 

Platform Life Cycle Management 

Amadeus Hospitality

www.amadeus-hospitality.com
